statements: SELECT * FROM secure_data_transfer_protocols WHERE id = 1;
SELECT source_system, destination_system FROM secure_data_transfer_protocols WHERE transfer_status = TRUE;
SELECT id, data_payload FROM secure_data_transfer_protocols WHERE destination_system = 'DatabaseServer';
SELECT * FROM secure_data_transfer_protocols ORDER BY transfer_timestamp DESC;
SELECT destination_system, transfer_timestamp FROM secure_data_transfer_protocols WHERE transfer_status = FALSE;
SELECT * FROM secure_data_transfer_protocols WHERE transfer_status = TRUE
SELECT source_system, destination_system, transfer_status FROM secure_data_transfer_protocols ORDER BY transfer_timestamp DESC
SELECT id, source_system, destination_system, transfer_timestamp FROM secure_data_transfer_protocols WHERE data_payload LIKE '%confidential%'
SELECT id, source_system, destination_system, transfer_timestamp FROM secure_data_transfer_protocols WHERE source_system = 'SystemA' AND destination_system = 'SystemB'
SELECT id, source_system, data_payload FROM secure_data_transfer_protocols ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT * FROM secure_data_transfer_protocols;
SELECT protocol_name, data_transfer_speed FROM secure_data_transfer_protocols WHERE secure_connection = TRUE;
SELECT id, protocol_name, encryption_key FROM secure_data_transfer_protocols ORDER BY encryption_key DESC;
SELECT id, data_category, data_value FROM sensitive_information WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM secure_data_transfer_protocols WHERE data_transfer_speed > 1000;
SELECT * FROM secure_data_transfer_protocols WHERE data_transfer_speed > 100 ORDER BY protocol_name DESC;
SELECT id, protocol_name, encryption_key FROM secure_data_transfer_protocols WHERE secure_connection = TRUE;
SELECT id, protocol_name, encryption_key, data_transfer_speed FROM secure_data_transfer_protocols WHERE data_transfer_speed BETWEEN 50 AND 200 ORDER BY data_transfer_speed DESC;
SELECT * FROM secure_data_transfer_protocols WHERE protocol_name LIKE 'S%' AND encryption_key IS NOT NULL;
SELECT id, protocol_name, secure_connection FROM secure_data_transfer_protocols WHERE encryption_key LIKE '%abc%' OR data_transfer_speed < 50;
SELECT * FROM secure_transfer_protocols;
SELECT protocol_name, encryption_type, key_length FROM secure_transfer_protocols WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, protocol_name, encryption_type FROM secure_transfer_protocols ORDER BY protocol_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM data_transfer_logs WHERE data_size > 1000;
SELECT log_id, timestamp, source_system, destination_system FROM data_transfer_logs ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT protocol_name, encryption_type FROM secure_transfer_protocols;
SELECT * FROM data_transfer_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, protocol_name, encryption_type, key_length FROM secure_transfer_protocols WHERE key_length > 128;
SELECT source_ip, action FROM unauthorized_access_logs WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT source_system, destination_system, data_size FROM data_transfer_logs WHERE source_system = 'SystemA' ORDER BY data_size DESC;
SELECT * FROM secure_data_transfers;
SELECT sender_system, receiver_system, transfer_timestamp FROM secure_data_transfers WHERE data_transfer_id = 1;
SELECT user_name, access_level FROM access_controls WHERE last_login > '2022-01-01';
SELECT key_id, encryption_algorithm FROM encryption_keys ORDER BY key_id DESC;
SELECT log_id, log_message, log_timestamp FROM audit_logs WHERE log_timestamp < '2022-03-01' ORDER BY log_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM secure_data_transfers;
SELECT data_transfer_id, sender_system, transfer_timestamp FROM secure_data_transfers WHERE data_transfer_id = 1;
SELECT sender_system, receiver_system FROM secure_data_transfers ORDER BY transfer_timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_name, access_level FROM access_controls WHERE access_level = 'Admin';
SELECT * FROM encryption_keys WHERE encryption_algorithm = 'AES';
SELECT * FROM system_users;
SELECT id, username, email FROM system_users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT source_name, connection_string FROM data_sources ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, transfer_id, transfer_date FROM data_transfer_logs WHERE source_id = 2 AND destination_id = 3;
SELECT key_name, key_value, expiration_date FROM encryption_keys WHERE expiration_date > CURRENT_TIMESTAMP;
SELECT * FROM system_users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, username FROM system_users WHERE username LIKE '%admin%';
SELECT id, source_name, connection_string FROM data_sources ORDER BY source_name DESC;
SELECT d.id, d.source_id, s.source_name FROM data_transfer_logs d INNER JOIN data_sources s ON d.source_id = s.id;
SELECT id, key_name, created_date, expiration_date FROM encryption_keys WHERE expiration_date > NOW();
